title: YouTube’s Censors Get the Science of Medicine Wrong
sub_head: Modern medicine doesn’t believe in authorities but in evidence.
body:
How shocking it is to read in your editorial that YouTube’s standard for medical misinformation is information that contradicts authorities (“YouTube’s Assault on Covid Accountability,” April 9). Modern medicine doesn’t believe in authorities but in evidence based on data analyzed from randomized controlled studies. We must never allow anonymous censors to determine what is medical misinformation and cancel scientific inquiry and discussion with which they disagree.
Associate Prof. Seymour M. Cohen
Mount Sinai School of Medicine
New York
